text.0: in forefront of the cars forth goes the hero the leader winning spoil his host rejoices.
text.1: soma endues his robes of lasting colours and blesses for his friends their calls on indra.
text.2: men decked with gold adorn his golden tendril incessantly with steedimpelling homage.
text.3: the friend of indra mounts his car wellknowing he comes thereon to meet the prayer we offer.
text.4: o god for service of the gods flow onward for food sublime as indras drink o soma.
text.5: making the floods bedewing earth and heaven come from the vast comfort us while we cleanse thee.
text.6: flow for prosperity and constant vigour flow on for happiness and high perfection.
text.7: this is the wish of these friends assembled this is my wish o soma pavamana.
text.8: father of holy hymns soma flows onward the father of the earth father of heaven.
text.9: father of agni sūryas generator the father who begat indra and viṣṇu.

text.11: falcon amid the vultures axe of forests over the cleansing sieve goes soma singing.
text.12: he soma pavamana like a river hath stirred the wave of voice our songs and praises.
text.13: beholding these inferior powers in cattle he rests among them as a steer wellknowing.
text.14: as gladdener warrior never harmed in battle with thousand genial streams pour strength and vigour.
text.15: as thoughtful pavamana urge o indu speeding the kine the plants wave on to indra.
text.16: dear grateful to the gods on to the beaker moves soma sweet to indra to delight him.
text.17: with hundred powers with thousand currents indu like a strong carhorse goes to the assembly.
text.18: born in old time as finderout of treasures drained with the stone decking himself in waters.
text.19: warding off curses king of all existence he shall find way for prayer the while they cleanse him.
text.20: for our sage fathers soma pavamana of old performed by thee their sacred duties.
text.21: fighting unvanquished open the enclosures enrich us with large gifts of steeds and heroes.
text.22: as thou didst flow for manu lifebestowing foequeller comforter rich in oblations.
text.23: even thus flow onward now conferring riches combine with indra and bring forth thy weapons.
text.24: flow onward soma rich in sweets and holy enrobed in waters on the fleecy summit.
text.25: settle in vessels that are full of fatness as cheering and most gladdening drink for indra.

text.30: cleansed by the pressers armed with noble weapons stream to us the fair secret name thou bearest.
